summary: Add items into vendor lists, player chests, and selected locations around Tamriel.
descriptionHtml:
[size=7][color=gray] Snufkin's Wayfarer Pack [/color][/size]

[size=2em]
When starting a new character, have you often resorted to using the console to have a set of starting gear? Have you got mods that add spectacular new items but no sane way to get them in the world? Then this mod might be just right for you At startup, sets of hand-picked items from a selection of mods are distributed to player home chests and some locations across Tamriel. Some items are dynamically added to vendor leveled lists so you can buy some of these items from vendors instead of magically popping them into your inventory via player.additem.

To get the best benefit, Alternate Start is highly recommended Depending on where you start your game, you can start with a set of balanced items in the beginning right after creating a new character. The items are right there if you choose to start as a home owner, "camping the wilds" or from Solitude docks. If you don't, the items will still be there waiting for you. All player homes in major cities and the wardrobe in College of Winterhold receive a pack of items. Not all items are the same, there is some variation in the selection.

The script detects presence of other mods and dynamically gives you items from them No other mods are explicitly [i]required[/i], but without any you'll receive barely anything else but common torches.
[/size]


[size=5][color=#a3e0f0][u] All items placed by this mod [/u][/color][/size]

[list]
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51077/] Alchemists Compendium [/url][/size]
- the book can be found in some locations and purchased from various vendors

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557/] Alternate Start - Live Another Life [/url][/size]
- add items into "hunting in the woods" sack near Helgen and Karnsdale chest

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20924/] Ambrosia Fashions [/url][/size]
- most outfits can be bought from vendors, some outfits found in starter packs

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42917/] Artifacts of Ultima [/url][/size]
- random chance to find a fire sword in Jorrvaskr basement

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12092/] Cloaks of Skyrim [/url][/size]
- cloaks from local hold

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24342/] DreamBurrows Regal Assassin Armor [/url][/size]
- all apparel, random variant at starting packs

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37665/] Druid Essentials [/url][/size]
- random spells added to starting packs

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44592/] EotW Dovahkiins Journeyman Armor [/url][/size]
- random armor variant set

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4331/] Equipable Map [/url][/size]
- maps to vendors, a random treasure map to starting packs

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11163/] Frostfall [/url][/size]
- backpack, walking stick, axe

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17607/] Guardian Stones Stash [/url][/size]
- all clothes to various vendors, random cloth to starting packs

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22812/] Hot Property [/url][/size]
- all fine clothes are purchasable from vendor at Radiant Raiment
- receive random cloth at starting pack

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/] Immersive Armors [/url][/size]
- fur collar, witchplate hood, paladin helmet, some chain mails

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27644/] Immersive Weapons [/url][/size]
- wooden staff, elven hawk bow

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52350/] Junk Yard [/url][/size]
- house keys to Scholar's Solace, Nyyrikki and Old Oak

[size=4][url=http://haishao.blogspot.com/2013/05/lamp-follower.html] Lamp Follower [/url][/size]
- you can find the helpful magical lantern follower in Midden

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25113/] Nordic Ranger Outfit [/url][/size]
- all apparel, receive random variant at starting packs

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20911/] Seadog Pirate Armor [/url][/size]
- all apparel into a knapsack at Solitude docks

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30473/] Telescope [/url][/size]
- four different telescopes added to vendors and random starting packs

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39959/] Ultimate Assortment [/url][/size]
- chance to find a shield and a sword in starting packs and vendors

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49130/] Velvet Robes and Cloaks [/url][/size]
- robes and cloaks to fine clothes vendor leveled lists, one random robe to Winterhold

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48669/] Wands of Skyrim [/url][/size]
- novice maple wand into the College wardrobe

[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17416/] Wearable Lanterns [/url][/size]
- lanterns, available from vendors and in starting packs
[/list]


[size=5][color=#a3e0f0][u] Locations [/u][/color][/size]

[size=4] Solitude Proudspire Manor [/size]

[size=4] Solitude Docks [/size]

[size=4] Markarth exterior Khajit caravan camp vendor [/size]
[size=4] Whiterun Breezehome [/size]
[size=4] Riften Honeyside [/size]
[size=4] Windhelm Hjerim [/size]
[size=4] Windhelm Docks [/size]
[size=4] Dawnstar Docks [/size]
[size=4] Winterhold College Hall of Attainment wardrobe [/size]
[size=4] Hall of the Vigilant [/size]
[size=4] Blackreach Field Lab [/size]
[size=4] Winterhold College Midden [/size]


[size=5][color=#fa2334][u] Incompatibilities [/u][/color][/size]
[size=4] More Interesting Loot - removes items added to some merchants [/size]
author: Snufkin
